33 template <class T>
34 void constrain(T &value, T min, T max){
35  if(value > max){
36  value = max;
37  } else if(value < min){
38  value = min;
39  }
40 }

49  if(value < 0)
50  value*=-1;

62  if(value1 > value2)
63  return value1;

65 }

75  if(value1 < value2)
76  return value1;

89 template <class T>
90 T map(T input, T inMin, T inMax, T outMin, T outMax){
91  T output = (input - inMin) * (outMax - outMin) / (inMax - inMin) + outMin;
92  return output;
93 }
94 
102 const vector_drive::thrusterPercents& vectorMath(const double &linearX, const double &linearY, const double &angularX){
103 
104  //if values out of range flag an error
105  if(abs(linearX) > 1 || abs(linearY) > 1 || abs(angularX) > 1){
106  //ROS_ERROR("cmd_vel value out of range!\nEntering safe mode and disabling thrusters... ");
107  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("linearX: " << linearX << " linearY: " << linearY << " angularX: " << angularX);
108  }
109 
110  //inversion, sensitivity, bi-linear threshold are handled in rov_control_interface (drive_control node)
111  //deadzone handled by joy package
112 
113  //Motor calculations
114  double T1 = linearX - linearY - angularX;
115  double T2 = -linearX - linearY + angularX;
116  double T3 = -linearX + linearY - angularX;
117  double T4 = linearX + linearY + angularX;
118 
119 
120  //Normalize the values so that no motor outputs over 100% thrust
121  double maxMotor = max(max(max(abs(T1), abs(T2)), T3), T4);
122  double maxInput = max(max(abs(linearX), abs(linearY)), abs(angularX));
123 
124  if(maxMotor == 0)
125  maxMotor = 1;
126 
127  T1 *= maxInput / maxMotor;
128  T2 *= maxInput / maxMotor;
129  T3 *= maxInput / maxMotor;
130  T4 *= maxInput / maxMotor;
131 
132 
133 
134  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("T1: " << thrustPercents.t1 << " T2: " <<
135  thrustPercents.t2 << " T3: " << thrustPercents.t3 << " T4: " << thrustPercents.t4);
136 
137  //load thruster values into custom int32 ROS message
138  thrustPercents.t1 = T1*1000;
139  thrustPercents.t2 = T2*1000;
140  thrustPercents.t3 = T3*1000;
141  thrustPercents.t4 = T4*1000;
142 
143 
144  return thrustPercents;
145 }
146 
152 void commandVectorCallback(const geometry_msgs::Twist::ConstPtr& vel)
153 {
154  //only deals with values pertaining to horizontal vector drive
155 
156  //linear (L-R)
157  double linearX = vel->linear.x;
158 
159  //linear (F-B)
160  double linearY = vel->linear.y;
161 
162  //angular
163  double angularX = vel->angular.x;
164 
165  vectorMath(linearX, linearY, angularX);
166 
167  //publish message
168  pub.publish(thrustPercents);
169 }
170 
171 int main(int argc, char **argv)
172 {
173 
174  //initialize node for horizontal vector drive
175  ros::init(argc, argv, "horiz_drive");
176 
177  ros::NodeHandle n;
178 
179  //ROS publisher to send thruster percent to hardware control node for CAN transmission
180  pub = n.advertise<vector_drive::thrusterPercents>("rov/cmd_horizontal_vdrive", 1);
181 
182  //ROS subscriber to get vectors from the joystick control input
183  sub = n.subscribe("rov/cmd_vel", 1, commandVectorCallback);
184 
185 
186  ros::spin();
187 
188  return 0;
189 }
